definitions.definition: To cause (a person or animal) to be fat or fatter.
definitions.example: We must fatten the turkey in time for Thanksgiving.

definitions.definition: (of a person or animal) To become fat or fatter.
definitions.example: He gradually fattened in the five years after getting married.

definitions.definition: To make thick or thicker (something containing paper, often money).
The act of making something fatter, particularly in reference or allusion to livestock.
That causes weight gain; often of high calorie food with relatively little nutritive value.
